name: Phytotracker
short_description: A large amount of seeds, plants and plasmids are produced in a typical plant science laboratory which needs careful management to track and maintain this collection. Here, we introduce ‘Phytotracker’, a laboratory management system designed specifically to organise and track plasmids, seeds and live plants. Phytotracker has been developed and fine-tuned over many years in a working plant science lab always with the user in mind.
summary: Phytotracker is a laboratory management system designed for plant labs
